title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 270.1 - Time and place for filing City of Yonkers earnings tax returns and payment of City of Yonkers earnings tax
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 270.1 - Time and place for filing City of Yonkers earnings tax returns and payment of City of Yonkers earnings tax

State Regulations

Tax Law, § 10 of § 1340(c); Codes and Ordinances of the

City of Yonkers, § 92-107

The provisions of Part 152 of this Title, with respect to
the time and place for filing New York State income tax returns and payment of

New York State income tax, shall also be applicable to the time and place for
filing City of Yonkers earnings tax returns and payment of City of Yonkers
earnings tax. Also see Part 265 of this Title with respect to combined returns
and payment of a single amount to the State Tax Commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§
270.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
